message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $12,000 by you. Considering its unique features and high quality, I am proposing a special deal for you today. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $14,000?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the deal, but I'm only willing to pay $12,000 for this product.  Let me know if you're willing to accept that price.
